boardgame.description: The little magician apprentices have lost some magic objects inside of the master_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s maze. Now they try to collect them before the Master notices anything. However, in the maze there are invisible walls and only one of the missing objects is revealed at a time. So they have to make their way through the maze by means of a good memory and lots of skill._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player moves their magician over the board while trying not to bump the labyrinth below. Each magician is joined with a magnetic ball so if you hit a wall the ball drops and you have to start all over again._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Brand new, in shrink. Will ship via USPS Priority at actual cost from the 94024 zip code. I will ship the day of or the day after I receive payment. Will combine shipping.

Das Magische Labyrinth version. Brand new, in shrink. Will ship via USPS Priority or FedEx ground at actual cost from the 94024 zip code. FedEx ground is significantly cheaper if shipped to a business address. Game will ship the day of or the day after payment clears. Will combine shipping.
Das Magische Labyrinth. New in shrink. Ships via UPS Ground from 23059

Playroom Entertainment (PLE 89100) The little magician apprentices have lost some objects in the magic maze. Now, they try to collect them, before the Master notices anything. However, in the maze, the little magicians always bump against invisible walls. So, they have to make their way through the maze by means of a good memory and lots of skill. You have to move an character through the board but, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re trying to do so with a labyrinth below the first board. The character is joined with a magnetic ball, so, if you hit a wall, the ball drops and you have to start again.

You have to move an character through the board but, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re trying to do so with a labyrinth below the first board. The character is joined with a magnetic ball, so, if you hit a wall, the ball drops and you have to start again.

The little magician apprentices have lost some objects in the magic maze. Now, they try to collect them, before the Master notices anything. However, in the maze, the little magicians always bump against invisible walls. So, they have to make their way through the maze by means of a good memory and lots of skill. You have to move a character through the board but, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re trying to do so with a labyrinth below the first board. The character is joined with a magnetic ball, so, if you hit a wall, the ball drops and you have to start again.

Standard Shipping to USA48: $9.00 I will combine shipping to save you money when ordering multiple games. Standard shipping is UPS Ground. Other shipping options are available upon request (Next Day / USPS / FEDEX). Contact for shipping quote. Alaska and Hawaii orders are shipped via USPS. Orders ship within 1 business day from receipt of payment (5-10 day waiting period on personal checks). Ohio residents will be charged 6.5% sales tax. This is the multilingual edition, by publisher Drei Magier Spiele. The rules are in several languages (English, French, German, Dutch, Italian). The game components are language-independent. It is brand new, still in the factory shrink wrap. -No sales tax will be applied. -Game will be shipped in a sturdy box. -Will be shipped within 1-2 business days after payment is received. -Shipping to East Coast or Midwest will be ~$12, further West will be ~$15, using Priority Mail. -Delivery confirmation covered in the shipping cost.
